strategy: Apply a gradient-boosting model (e.g., XGBoost) with targeted feature engineering focused on categorical interactions, such as combining passenger class and gender to create a 'class-gender' interaction term. Additionally, encode embarked port as a categorical variable and introduce dummy variables for port-of-departure. Use cross-validation with stratified splits to ensure balanced training and avoid overfitting to the survival class imbalance.

test_df = test_df[common_columns]
